answers.answer: after 32weeks then when u get to 37 iseveryweek
Oh okay then I'm a little ways away from that! I'm only 27 weeks
I think I started at 31 weeks. I'm now 35 weeks. I am basically going every week now. Because I was on an odd number of weeks. At 36 weeks, you go every week until you deliever.
I am now starting every 2 weeks, I had an appt today and go back in 2 weeks and then 2 weeks again I am also 27 weeks.
At 36 weeks I started every 2 weeks
I guess its different depending on your doctor. Hmm we will see at my appt today
Yea they told me after 27 weeks
I started going every two weeks after 26 weeks because I had to reschedule my glucose test for 28 weeks.
Well I go back in 2 weeks and then I'm gojng every week. I'm now labeled as high risk.
Why are you now labeled as high risk?

My baby girl is measuring a week behind, and I've lost a pound since my last visit. They wanna keep an eye on her growth and because my iron levels haven't went up and now my calcium and vitamin d is low. All that combined my Dr said I'm now high risk.
But on the bright side... I passed my diabetes test!

question: So this app says ill probably be having appts every 2 weeks now instead of every 4. My question is when did you ladies(without any complications) start going every 2 weeks?
title: appointments
